original_text: She liked to receive honour. She bought expensive things to enjoy a wicked life. So now give her the trouble and pain that she deserves. She has said to herself, “I rule people like a queen. I do not live like a widow. I will never need to be sad.” She liked to receive honour. She bought expensive things to enjoy a wicked life. So now give her the trouble and pain that she deserves. She has said to herself, “I rule people like a queen. I do not live like a widow. I will never need to be sad.” She liked to receive honour.
korean_text: 그가 얼마나 자기를 영화롭게 하였으며 사치하였든지 그만큼 고통과 애통함으로 갚아 주라 그가 마음에 말하기를 나는 여왕으로 앉은 자요 과부가 아니라 결단코 애통함을 당하지 아니하리라 하니

sentences.original_text: So now give her the trouble

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그녀가 받을 만한 아픔을 주십시오.

sentences.original_text: I rule people like a queen.
I do not live like a widow.
I will never need to be sad.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 슬플 필요가 결코 없을 것입니다.
